data.title: West Ham Legends
data.meta_description:
Amassing more than 900 appearances in the Claret & Blue of the Hammers between them, three West Ham legends are coming to town to talk about their action-packed football careers.
Starring Sir Trevor Brooking, Tony Gale & Frank McAvennie along with your host Perry Groves from Talk Sport
data.text:
Amassing more than 900 appearances in the Claret & Blue of the Hammers between them, three West Ham legends are coming to town to talk about their action-packed football careers.

Starring Sir Trevor Brooking, Tony Gale & Frank McAvennie along with your host Perry Groves from Talk Sport will discuss the games, dressing room/training ground stories, managers, fall outs and everything you wanted to know about playing for a successful football club.

There will be a chance to pose questions to the stars during the evening.

A limited number of VIP tickets are available, affording the opportunity for a meet and greet with the legendary players and a photograph opportunity before the show.

Regular and VIP tickets available now from the venue ticket office.
